full_threads.body:
Hi Allie,

The team have noticed the following, if you could please amend.

The number hasn't been updated for the Blocked Drains page (and other pages), which is our landing page for the ads. Please update across all other pages on the site.

Kind regards,
Deana

Hi Deana,

Thank you so much—so glad to hear it’s all looking good on your end!

And absolutely, if anything else pops up or if there’s ever anything you’d like tweaked, just let us know.

Always happy to jump in and help.

Hi Allie,

Awesome job! All looks good from my end.

Thank you!

Kind regards,
Deana

Hi Deana,

Thank you so much for the request!

Here are the updates I made:
  • I’ve updated the number to 02 9138 0966 with the right spacing
  • It’ll now stay on one line across all devices
  • I’ve cleared the cache as well, just to make sure everything displays perfectly

Feel free to take a look and let me know if it’s all coming through correctly on your end.

Always happy to jump in and tweak if anything ever comes up!

Hi Allie,

Thank you!

One final tweak - could you make the number read 02 9138 0966

Thanks,
Deana

Hi Deana,

Thank you for telling me that—I really appreciate it!

Here’s what I’ve updated:
  • Adjusted the font so the number should now stay on one line
  • Cleared the cache and double-checked on mobile—looks good on my end

When you get a moment, feel free to let me know if it looks right on your side.

If it still doesn’t feel quite right, just let me know—I’m happy to tweak it!

Always here if anything else pops up.

Hi Allie,

Thank you for making the changes.

Can you please make the number appear in one line instead of two. This is what it currently looks like:

Kind regards,
Deana

Hey Deana,

Thank you so much for trusting Wolf IQ with this request—we really appreciate it!

Just letting you know the update has been completed.

The phone number is now added as standard text and positioned over the phone image on the Nardi Plumbing website, just as discussed.

Feel free to take a look and let us know if there’s anything you’d like tweaked. Always here to help!

@allieB @glen Done on this one.
I made some changes overflowing text issue on the footer and fix the header mobile

Tagging this to pointdot.com.au as dean requested it :)

(Time: 30mins)

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body: hi, @joel need your assistance with this. thanks

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body: Hey @glen assigning this back to you, please let me know once updated.

Hi Allie,

Thank you for getting back to me. Please proceed with implementing this change on the website and let us know once the update has been completed.

Kind regards,
Deana

Hi Deana,

Thank you so much for the request.

We can definitely replace the phone number image with text placed over the phone image, which should help with tracking.

Just a quick note that this will need a bit of custom coding to make sure the number sits correctly and stays responsive across devices.
  • Estimated time: around 30 minutes
  • We’ll add 02 9138 0966 as standard text over the existing phone image

Let us know if you’d like us to proceed—always happy to assist.

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Allie Borcena

full_threads.body:
@allieB

Just a quick heads-up: placing standard text directly over the phone image can be tricky, mainly because screen sizes vary quite a bit across devices. This makes the positioning unpredictable and could cause the number to end up in the wrong spot depending on the user’s screen.
